SEARCH
Package com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.recipient

Interface Recipient.Sendable

All Superinterfaces:
Recipient
All Known Implementing Classes:
Recipient.Proxied, Recipient.Valid
Enclosing interface:
Recipient
public static sealed interface Recipient.Sendable extends Recipient permits Recipient.Valid, Recipient.Proxied
A marker subinterface for Recipient types that are capable of receiving messages directly.

Includes Recipient.Valid and Recipient.Proxied recipients.
